input.text: In four dimensions there are six rotational degrees of freedom. In front of you are six spheres demonstrating rotation in each of them. On the top row you have the same rotations as in three D. On the bottom row you have rotations that move through the fourth dimension. The position of the spheres in the fourth dimension is determined by their colour so when you see their colour change, they are moving through the fourth dimension. When you are ready click the sign to begin playing some pool.
